Sentencas: Strontium (Sr) diffusion in magnetron sputtered gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) thin films is investigated.
Titulo: Strontium Diffusion in Magnetron Sputtered Gadolinia-Doped Ceria Thin Film Barrier Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: For this purpose, a model system consisting of a screen printed (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3- (LSCF) layer, and thin films of CGO and yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) is prepared to simulate a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Strontium Diffusion in Magnetron Sputtered Gadolinia-Doped Ceria Thin Film Barrier Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This setup allows observation of Sr diffusion by observing SrZrO3 formation using X-ray diffraction while annealing.
Titulo: Strontium Diffusion in Magnetron Sputtered Gadolinia-Doped Ceria Thin Film Barrier Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Subsequent electron microscopy confirms the results.
Titulo: Strontium Diffusion in Magnetron Sputtered Gadolinia-Doped Ceria Thin Film Barrier Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This approach presents a simple method for assessing the quality of CGO barriers without the need for a complete fuel cell test setup.
Titulo: Strontium Diffusion in Magnetron Sputtered Gadolinia-Doped Ceria Thin Film Barrier Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: CGO films with thicknesses ranging from 250 nm to 1.2 m are tested at temperatures from 850 degrees C to 1000 degrees C which yields an in-depth understanding of Sr diffusion through CGO thin films that may be of high scientific and technical interest for implementation of novel fuel cell materials.
Titulo: Strontium Diffusion in Magnetron Sputtered Gadolinia-Doped Ceria Thin Film Barrier Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Sr is found to diffuse along column/grain boundaries in the CGO films but by modifying the film thickness and microstructure the breaking temperature of the barrier can be increased.
Titulo: Strontium Diffusion in Magnetron Sputtered Gadolinia-Doped Ceria Thin Film Barrier Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
